name: Pathfinder Demo (pyroceper)
description:
The game is still a WiP. I couldn't complete it because of school and irl stuff.

Right now, it's just a demo of a working pathfinder. There's just one AI unit that moves towards the player unit. The unit selection menu doesn't work. It just shows the possible moves that the player can make.

The game once completed will have a weapon triangle system like Fire Emblem.

Hopefully, it will be completed by the end of November :)

Tested the prototype on the mGBA 0.9.3 and 2DS (vc injector) and it works :)

The code is open source. Feel free to take a peek at the source code. You can also use the pathfinder in your own games :D !

https://github.com/pyroceper/rock_paper_shotgun_tactics

Controls:

D-PadMove cursor
SelectABackB
